meanings.definition: Teasing or joking in a playful manner.
meanings.sent1: The joshings banter between friends brought smiles to their faces.
meanings.sent2: She appreciated his joshings comments that lightened the mood.
meanings.sent3: The joshings remarks at the party made everyone laugh.
meanings.sent4: His joshings nature was like a ray of sunshine on a cloudy day.
meanings.sent5: The joshings tone in his voice was infectious, spreading joy to all.

meanings.definition: The act of making playful or teasing remarks.
meanings.sent1: Their joshings during the game added a fun element to the competition.
meanings.sent2: She engaged in friendly joshings with her siblings during dinner.
meanings.sent3: The joshings among coworkers lightened the work atmosphere.
meanings.sent4: His joshings were like little sparks of humor in everyday conversations.
meanings.sent5: The room echoed with the joshings of children playing happily together.
